m_tests.name: Simple Center
m_tests.desc: A simple centered icon with a title below it.

m_tests.name: Title Grid
m_tests.desc: A title area with a logo, title and date. The text should be centered the image to left and the date to the right

m_tests.name: Footer Grid
m_tests.desc: An icon and date to the right of the screen and a text to the left.

m_tests.name: Multiple Grids
m_tests.desc: Various icons and text tests in a single form.

m_tests.name: Padding 1
m_tests.desc: Pad form so the buttons are at the bottom of the screen.

m_tests.name: Padding 1
m_tests.desc: Pad form with centered items and bottom of the screen.
